articles.description: Luis Enrique's thrilling young Paris St-Germain side are on the verge of history. Phil McNulty explains how they got there.
articles.title: PSG v Inter Milan: Can Luis Enrique's PSG young guns land elusive Champions League crown?

articles.description: Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz is forced to fight for his place in the French Open fourth round with a testing victory over Damir Dzumhur.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Carlos Alcaraz beats Damir Dzumhur in four sets

articles.description: The BBC's Simon Stone covered Man United's post-season tour of Kuala Lumpur and Hong Kong and the trip did not go to plan.
articles.title: Man Utd tour of Asia: Inside the troubled trip to Kuala Lumpur and Hong Kong

articles.description: All eyes were on goalkeeper Hannah Hampton after a rocky week for the England squad - but just half an hour in, it was someone else taking the spotlight at Wembley.
articles.title: England 6-0 Portugal: 'Vintage' Lionesses entertain in commanding win

articles.description: He loves a goal celebration but fun-loving Jeremie Frimpong, who is joining champions Liverpool, is deadly serious when it comes to his football.
articles.title: Jeremie Frimpong: The fun-loving wing-back raised in Manchester and joining Liverpool

articles.description: Amy Jones answers Charlotte Edwards' call for more "smartness" in 50-over cricket at the first time of asking with her first international century after being promoted to open.
articles.title: England vs West Indies: Amy Jones' 'relief' and 'pride' as the first international century finally comes

articles.description: McLaren's Lando Norris heads Red Bull's Max Verstappen and Ferrari's Lewis Hamilton in first practice at the Spanish Grand Prix.
articles.title: Spanish Grand Prix 2025: Lando Norris tops first practice in Barcelona

articles.description: AC Milan reappoint Massimiliano Allegri as their head coach, following the dismissal of Sergio Conceicao.
articles.title: Massimiliano Allegri: AC Milan reappoint Italian head coach for second spell

articles.description: Joao Fonseca only broke into the world's top 100 earlier this year - but is already known by superstar footballers and wanted on TV chat shows.
articles.title: French Open 2025: Joao Fonseca carries Brazil hopes as he looks to shock Jack Draper

articles.description: Mumbai Indians keep their hopes in the Indian Premier League alive and knock out Gujarat Titans by holding on to win a high-scoring eliminator by 20 runs.
articles.title: IPL 2025: Mumbai Indians beat Gujarat Titans in high-scoring eliminator
